designVariations.name: Gold Coast Professional
designVariations.rationale: This design reflects Happy Tap's local Gold Coast identity with ocean-inspired blues paired with professional confidence. The clean, trustworthy aesthetic emphasizes their 'friendly expert' positioning while maintaining the reliability trades customers expect.

layout.hero: Split-screen hero with service imagery on left, bold headline and CTAs on right
layout.sections: Alternating left-right content blocks with generous whitespace
layout.cards: Clean minimal cards with subtle shadows and rounded corners

designVariations.recommendationReason: Best balances the friendly local business personality with professional trades credibility, while the Gold Coast color palette creates strong local connection.

designVariations.name: Industrial Strength
designVariations.rationale: Emphasizes Happy Tap's comprehensive plumbing and roofing capabilities with industrial aesthetics. The bold, utilitarian design communicates strength and reliability, perfect for emergency services and major installations.

layout.hero: Full-width background with centered bold typography and overlaid service badges
layout.sections: Grid-based layout with strong geometric divisions
layout.cards: Angular cards with bold borders and high contrast styling

designVariations.name: Friendly Expert
designVariations.rationale: Captures Happy Tap's unique 'no plumbers crack' guarantee and friendly approach with warmer colors and approachable design. The forest green suggests growth and trust while maintaining professional credibility for plumbing services.

layout.hero: Centered hero with circular service icons and flowing content arrangement
layout.sections: Card-focused layout with organic spacing and friendly imagery
layout.cards: Soft rounded cards with warm shadows and welcoming imagery

designVariations.name: Coastal Utility
designVariations.rationale: Combines Happy Tap's Gold Coast location with utility-focused design through coastal teal and modern typography. This variation emphasizes their comprehensive service range while maintaining the beachside professionalism expected on the Gold Coast.

layout.hero: Diagonal split layout with service showcase and prominent contact information
layout.sections: Staggered content blocks with coastal-inspired flow
layout.cards: Layered cards with depth and maritime-inspired spacing

stories.title: Project setup: Next.js + Tailwind, Cloudflare config
stories.description: Initialize a Next.js project with Tailwind CSS, configured for Cloudflare Pages deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14+ project initialized with TypeScript and App Router
Tailwind CSS configured and working
npm run build succeeds without errors
next.config.js configured for static export (output: 'export')

stories.title: Homepage: hero with images, services grid, trust signals, CTA
stories.description: Build the homepage using downloaded images from assets/images/ for hero, services overview, trust signals, and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with business name, tagline, and hero image from assets/images/
Services grid showing main offerings with relevant images
Trust signals section (reviews, certifications, experience)
Clear call-to-action buttons
Uses images from assets/images/ folder (NOT placeholder images)

stories.title: Services page with service images
stories.description: Create a dedicated services page using downloaded images for each service offering
acceptanceCriteria: All services from content/services.json displayed
Each service has name, description, and image from assets/images/
Consistent styling with homepage
Uses next/image for optimized image loading

stories.title: About page with team/business images
stories.description: Build the about page with business story and images from assets/images/
acceptanceCriteria: Business story section from content/about.json
Uses relevant images from assets/images/ (team photos, work photos, etc.)
Company values or mission statement
NO placeholder images - use actual downloaded assets

stories.title: Contact page: form, map, details
stories.description: Create contact page with working form, embedded map, and contact details
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form with name, email, phone, message fields
Form submits to Formspree or similar service
Google Maps embed with business location
Phone, email, address, hours displayed from content/metadata.json

stories.title: Design system: Apply vertical aesthetic
stories.description: Implement the design system specific to the business vertical with distinctive typography, colors, and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Display font and body font from design direction applied via next/font
Color palette implemented as CSS variables in globals.css
Distinctive aesthetic - NOT generic (no Inter, Roboto)
Visual style matches the business vertical

stories.title: Motion & polish
stories.description: Add animations and polish including page load reveals, hover states, and smooth scrolling
acceptanceCriteria: Staggered page load animations using Framer Motion or CSS
Hover effects on interactive elements
Smooth scroll behavior
Respects prefers-reduced-motion

stories.title: AEO: LocalBusiness schema, meta tags, FAQ
stories.description: Implement Answer Engine Optimization with structured data, meta tags, and FAQ section
acceptanceCriteria: LocalBusiness JSON-LD schema with all business details
Meta title and description optimized for local search
FAQ section with 3-5 common questions
Schema validates at schema.org validator

stories.title: Mobile responsive
stories.description: Ensure the site is fully responsive on mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: No horizontal scroll at 375px width
Touch-friendly button sizes (min 44px)
Readable text without zooming
Mobile navigation works correctly

stories.title: Image optimization with next/image
stories.description: Optimize all images using Next.js Image component for performance
acceptanceCriteria: All images use next/image component
Images from assets/images/ are properly sized and optimized
Lazy loading enabled for below-fold images
Lighthouse Performance score > 90

stories.title: Deploy to Cloudflare Pages
stories.description: Deploy the completed Next.js static site to Cloudflare Pages
acceptanceCriteria: npm run build creates static export in /out folder
Site deployed successfully to Cloudflare Pages
Preview URL accessible and HTTPS working
Loads in under 3 seconds
